item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a veteran cloud architect with a passion for serverless architecture. Although I consider myself an architect, I’m very hands-on. I’ve designed and built systems from early Raspberry Pis, up to IBM mainframes and almost everything in between. Most of the code I write these days is unfortunately in private repos, as it is built for commercial use, but you are welcome to view my GitHub profile. I have amassed extensive management, mentoring and technical leadership experience.
